content: Is there a FHIR version of HL7 InfoButton https://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=208?
Like CDS Hooks? Can you explain your use case?

I have no specific use case. When I read that IG, which is on V3, I was wondering if there's FHIR version. I thought about CDS Hooks or CDS Connect. But I am not sure if those are the same. @Bryn Rhodes
Did you see this article on confluence? https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=75170592
There's also documentation for how CDS Hooks maps to FHIR.
